name: DigiDroidV1
description:
Download first version 1.0

In this version you have 3 starter digimons:

-Agumon

*Evoline complete, but attacks developed till champion

-Betamon

*Not recommended to evolve to champion bug may appear

-Crabmon

*Not recommended to evolve to champion bug may appear

Day/Night-Clock System

Battle system by turns

Skills

Skills works with skillpoints at lvl 11 you have ---> 11 skillpoints, etc.

Skills only in agumon rookie and champion mode

So agumon have F2 skill and greymon too :-D

Evolution stuff

In this version only agumon evolves to mega form

lvl 16 - Champion

lvl 32 - Ultimate

lvl 46- Mega
